Package com.hiddenswitch.spellsource

Interface Cards

  • public interface Cards
    The cards service. This manages the base card definitions.

    • Method Detail

      • query

        @Suspendable
static com.hiddenswitch.spellsource.models.QueryCardsResponse query​(com.hiddenswitch.spellsource.models.QueryCardsRequest request)
        Queries the card catalogue with the specified parameters and returns the corresponding card records. Useful for filtering through the card catalogue.
        Parameters:
        request - A variety of different filtering parameters for querying the card catalogue.
        Returns:
        Records which match the filters in the request.

      • getRandom

        static java.util.Random getRandom()

      • getCards

        static java.util.List<com.hiddenswitch.spellsource.client.models.CardRecord> getCards()
        Retrieves a freshly computed list containing all the collectible cards as client entities. Represents the current master collection of the game.
        Returns:
        The cards

static void invalidateCardCache()
